pullRequest.title: [hpprinter] Fix null check compiler warnings
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey stewart.cossey@gmail.com
Small changes to stop showing null warnings in the compiler.
There is one SuppressWarnings on a function which I felt was appropriate. However if there is a more "proper" way to do this then please suggest.

commit.message:
Fix null check compiler warnings.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>

Ensure all single line if statements contain curly braces.

Signed-off-by: Stewart Cossey <stewart.cossey@gmail.com>
